attributes.action: STOP Water Companies charging a ‘Fixed Charge’ on all household water bills.
attributes.additional_details: To abolish daily Fixed Charges by Water Companies.
attributes.background: Stop all Water Companies charging a daily ‘Fixed Charge’ on household bills.With the cost of living crisis consumers cannot afford these charges,the standing charges which in some cases be more than the cost of the actual bill is an unfair system & gives no incentive for households to save water.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746127
